text: The Midlands Partnership NHS Foundation Trust was created in June 2018 by a merger of Staffordshire and Stoke-on-Trent Partnership NHS Trust and the South Staffordshire and Shropshire Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust. It will have an annual turnover of more than £500 million. No more than 40 redundancies among the 8,500 staff were expected because of the merger. ==Doctors== There is an 11.5% vacancy rate for doctors in the Midlands, ==References== Category:Health in Staffordshire Category:NHS foundation trusts Category:Health in Shropshire
title: Midlands Partnership NHS Foundation Trust
